name: Ice and Fire (FleshEatingBull)
description:
For GDevelop Game Jam #3

Use separate elements to defeat the Wyrms.

WASD to move

Left Mouse - Fire Cast

Right Mouse - Ice Cast

Technically my first completed game, which is pretty cool.

Created in 3 days. Some assets do come from GDevelop store.

Ground Fire https://opengameart.org/content/animated-fire
